extendedInfo.description: The parish church of Holy Trinity in Stratford-upon-Avon, England is the church where Shakespeare was baptised and where he was buried. For centuries people have come from around the world to visit the site of his grave. But Holy Trinity has a deeper history and remains a vibrant place of worship and encounter with God.This app is a guide to over 1200 years of history, literature and devotion in this parish church. Discover the distant past and the living present, take your own pilgrimage and discover the hidden treasures of Shakespeare's church.Features include:- Interactive panoramas of the church interior- 3D model of the church that moves through nine centuries of growth as you move the model on the screen- Three guided 'trails' through the church focusing on Shakespeare's church, pilgrimage and hidden treasures

reviews.title: Basic interface, but good information
reviews.comment: The app installed correctly for me without issue and provides some great information about the church. There are some UI  issues certainly (moving the slider to see the outside of the church in different centuries also causes the model to rotate so it\'s impossible to view how the church changed from one direction). Overall, the app is nice and I\'m appreciative for the additional information it provides free of charge.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Package file invalid
reviews.comment: The app is apparently a massive 19.47MB but the download is 9.74.
reviews.author: A Google User
